TopicTitle: Help! Half of Laythe is Disappearing (Missing Terrain Tiles)

Articles.Content:
Howdy, running 1.8 with the updated Kopernicus.  Got real excited for that mod to be released up to 1.8, flew a whole 2nd mission to Laythe only to find many terrain tiles missing.

 

I've tried uninstalling EVE,  tried uninstalling Kopericus and reinstalling, no luck so far.

 

Has anyone experienced this?  Seems like everywhere I've roved or landed on Laythe is now missing its terrain tile.

 

https://imgur.com/a/CRDJWQp

This is a known issue, it'll be fixed in the next version. I'm not sure if that'll be for 1.8 or 1.9 though.

https://github.com/Kopernicus/Kopernicus/issues/424

Aha many thanks!

 

Also thanks to Kopernicus for all you do
